markdownRemark.html:
NDArray

Nth dimensional array

Models

Static computation graphs

  • Perceptron
  • FFNN

Dynamic computation graphs

  • RNN (Recurrent Neural Networks)
  • GANN (Generative Adversarial Neural Networks)

Frameworks

Tensorflow

Tensorflow is to be coded in a declarative fashion. It is a perfect match for static computation graphs.

PyTorch

PyTorch is to be coded in a imperative fashion. It is a perfect match for dynamic computation graphs.
